engine.component

Class KeyboardMoveComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.component.Component
      • engine.component.KeyboardMoveComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener

    public abstract class KeyboardMoveComponent
extends Component
implements KeyListener
    Specifies a game-focused type of keyboard listener.
    Author:
    Marco
